node.name: reflection
node.label: reflection
node.author: DRL
node.help: Simple reflection using "gather" construct and environment map for ray misses.

property.name: ConeAngle
property.help: The sampled cone is defined by vector +- ConeAngle measured in degrees. Therefore, angle of sampled cone = ConeAngle * 2!!! 90 = entire hemisphere.

property.name: MaxDist
property.help: Only render surfaces closer than this distance. Default is 1e38.

property.name: EnvMap_Ci
property.help: Color envMap file for rays that don't hit any surface.

property.name: EnvMap_Oi
property.help: Opacity envMap file for rays that don't hit any surface.

property.name: env_samples
property.help: Samples multiplier for envMap lookup. Controls antialiasing quality of environment.

property.name: expand
property.help: Duplicates values from single-channel envMaps to all color channels. Fills missing channels with "fill" color otherwise.

property.name: fill_Ci
property.help: If "expand" is off and "EnvMap_Ci" is single-channel texture, fills missing channels with this value.

property.name: fill_Oi
property.help: If "expand" is off and "EnvMap_Oi" is single-channel texture, fills missing channels with this value.

property.name: env_Ci
property.help: Flat color value, added to "EnvMap_Ci". Sets environment color if no envMap is specified.

property.name: env_Oi
property.help: Flat color value, added to "EnvMap_Oi". Sets environment color if no envMap is specified.
